original_text: The man took me through the entrance gate into the outside yard of the temple. I saw 30 rooms there, all along the wall of the yard. A path of flat stones was in front of the rooms.
korean_text: 그가 나를 데리고 바깥뜰에 들어가니 뜰 삼면에 박석 깔린 땅이 있고 그 박석 깔린 땅 위에 여러 방이 있는데 모두 서른이며

sentences.original_text: The man took me through the entrance gate
sentences.korean_translation: 그 사람은 나를 문 입구로 데려갔습니다

sentences.original_text: into the outside yard of the temple
all along the wall of the yard
A path of flat stones was in front of the rooms
sentences.korean_translation: 평평한 돌로 만든 길이 방들 앞에 있었습니다
